intro1.content: At the agents at headquarters have been turned into puppies. Again.

intro2.content: Help the puppy-agents go through the rooms in headquarters.

intro3.content: When they get to the end, we'll use a special gadget to turn them back into agents again.

intro4.content: And watch out - some creatures may have gotten loose in here.

less1.content: That's not enough puppies. Match the number of puppies shown.

less2.content: There aren't enough puppies on the pawprint switch. Add some puppies to get the exact number.

more1.content: That's too many puppies. Match the number of puppies shown.

more2.content: There are too many puppies on the pawprint switch. Take away some puppies to get the exact number.

puppy10.content: There should be exactly ten puppies on the pawprint.

puppy2.content: There should be exactly two puppies on the pawprint.

puppy3.content: There should be exactly three puppies on the pawprint.

puppy4.content: There should be exactly four puppies on the pawprint.

puppy5.content: There should be exactly five puppies on the pawprint.

puppy6.content: There should be exactly six puppies on the pawprint.

puppy7.content: There should be exactly seven puppies on the pawprint.

puppy8.content: There should be exactly eight puppies on the pawprint.

puppy9.content: There should be exactly nine puppies on the pawprint.

room13-1.content: This is the Town Observatory, the Puppy Master's hideout. Let's close this case once and for all.

room13-2.content: You did it. You turned all the puppies back into agents again. Good work, puppy, I mean - agent.

room2-1.content: There are two more puppies here.

room2-2.content: Count carefully. Get all 4 puppies on the pawprint switch to open the door.

room3-1.content: Here's some special puppy-toys for you to use.

room3-10.content: There should be exactly two puppies on the pawprint.

room3-2.content: Different groups of puppies, will follow each puppy-toy.

room3-3.content: Try each toy, and see which puppies follow it.

room3-5.content: You can use the toys as many times as you want.

room3-6.content: We can't go through the laser! Let's turn it off first.

room3-7.content: Count carefully and use a puppy toy to make 2 puppies sit on this pawprint switch.

room3-8.content: Look at this number. That's how many puppies we need.

room3-9.content: Move that exact number of puppies onto the paw print switch

room4-1.content: Some creatures have escaped. Be careful.

room4-2.content: This pawprint switch needs exactly 4 puppies to put the dinosaur back where it belongs.

room4-3.content: We need 4 puppies to sit on this pawprint switch.

room4-4.content: Move all the puppies here, and we'll zap them back into agents!

room4-5.content: We did it! Good work, agent.

room5-1.content: Jamie Jam caused some trouble at the Bakery. Let's get these puppies through the mess, and turn them back into agents.

room7-1.content: There's a new kind of puppy - an agent from the medical department.

room7-2.content: Use this new puppy toy to move the medical puppy.

room7-4.content: There's a big wall of jam blocking the puppies' way. We need to get rid of it.

room7-5.content: It takes exactly 5 puppies to activate this pawprint switch.

room9-1.content: Robert Plant is growing out of control! We have to zap him back to normal so we can turn these puppies back into agents. And watch out for the Glen Gushers cart.

tutor1.content: Here's a special gadget to use.

tutor2.content: Try moving the 'All Ball' gadget. All the puppies will follow it.

tutor4.content: We need to open THIS door to let the puppies through.

tutor5.content: This number shows how many puppies you need, to open the door.

tutor6.content: Get 2 puppies to sit on the pawprint switch in front of the door to open it.

tutor8.content: And remember to count your puppies carefully.
